items.item:
What's up? I appear in an incorrectly named
TextField
<font size="24" face="Georgia" color="#000000">Greetz. I only appear in the Library.</font>

<font size="24" face="Georgia" color="#000000">Howdy, I appear in multiple places.</font>
<font size="24" face="Georgia" color="#000000">Greetz. I also only appear in the Library.</font>
<font size="14" face="Georgia" color="#000000">Hello, I'm static TextField 2 of 2 sat on a MovieClip timeline!</font>
<font size="14" face="Georgia" color="#000000">Hello, I'm static TextField 1 of 2 sat on a MovieClip timeline!</font>
<font size="14" face="Georgia" color="#000000">Hello, I'm a static TextField sat on a Graphic timeline somewhere!</font>

Hello, I'm a static TextField sat directly
on the main stage!
